termsContentPlaceholder1: Welcome to FinanceFlow! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of FinanceFlow's website.
termsContentPlaceholder2: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use FinanceFlow if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
termsSection1Content: Unless otherwise stated, FinanceFlow and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on FinanceFlow. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from FinanceFlow for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
termsSection2Content: Certain parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information. FinanceFlow does not filter, edit, publish or review comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of FinanceFlow, its agents and/or affiliates.
